name: Facility Circuit Identification
title: FCKT
definition: Identifies the Facility ID, which has been assigned to the digital interface being designed to accommodate the request for switched access lines or trunks.
usageNotes: Required when the NC1 field on the FGA or Trunking Form is populated, and the RT field is “F”.
Prohibited when the first position of the LTP field on the ASR Form is “A”, “G”, “H”, “I”, “J” or “K”.
Prohibited when the LTP field on the ASR Form is not populated.
Prohibited when the RT field is “B”.
fieldNotes: The format of this field is defined COMMON LANGUAGE standards.
Multiple facilities are identified with a series or range of facility designations.
Facility designation series are separated with a comma.
Facility designation range, upper and lower limits are separated by a hyphen.
exampleNotes: This example indicates a single facility. 1 01,103,105/T1/ MI L WW I AUW01/MILWWI13 C G O
This example indicates multiple facilities – non- sequential entry. 1 01-105/T1/MILWWI A UW 0 1/MILWWI13 C  G O
This example indicates multiple facilities - range entry.
